body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have a creature die.
2. Summon Ulvenwald Bear. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Ulvenwald Bear's ability will trigger but the counters go directly onto the bear instead of being able to select a target. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.27. Windows 7

Relevant portion of game log attached.
